body.p:
If you have a custom template that was created in version 19.1 or older and you want to convert it to be compatible with version 21.0 or 21.1, you need to apply two conversion procedures:
Convert the old template to a version 20 Publishing Template by using this procedure: .
Convert that version 20 Publishing Template to version 21 by using this procedure: .
Result: The converted Publishing Template can now be used in version 21.0 or 21.1.
